name: Taimi
description:
Taimi is a local multiplayer game for mobile device where 2 people compete against each other in growing as long roots from a plant as they can.

Each player has three roots that they have to control simultaneously. If the root collides with the area edges, roots or stones it dies and can no longer be controlled. The last player to have any of their roots alive wins.

 Buttons:

Arrow to the right - Adjust the selected root to the right

Arrow to the left - Adjust the selected root to the left

Switch button - Switch controlled root to the right

Boost button - Increase controlled root growth speed temporarily

Credits:

Ville Vahla - Programming

Jonni Uusi-Hakimo - Programming

Miika Hannula - Art/Programming

 

Music by Toni Hatakka

Created for Finnish Game Jam 2023
